Pre-Game Insights: Colombia have progressed to the knockout rounds for the sixth successive Copa America tournament, after finishing top of Group D with seven points from three matches.
Colombia have won their last two meetings with Panama by an aggregate score of 7-0 - their last encounter (3-0) was back in June 2019.
Panama have qualified for the knockout rounds for the first time in their history this year after picking up six points to finish second in Group C.
